content: Basic question - if _type is sent on the bulk data request but is unvalued, is that technically considered to be no resources were asked for OR return all support resources (as if _type wasn't sent at all)? @Josh Mandel @Dan Gottlieb
The FHIR spec indicates empty search params should be ignored by the server and I'd think the behavior should be the same in this case - https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#errors
Thanks so much @Dan Gottlieb for the reference (and confirmation)!
